divs: Sighting Detailsi am a courier.while driving a route from 6 to 12 p.m. ,i was approaching lancaster,pa, when i noticed an object at the middle of my windshield.it looked to be as white as the moon and the size was about an eighth of the moon.seemed to be going north awway from me as i was going north on route 222,pa, .it looked as though it was tumbling top to bottom and seemed to have 6-8 sides. only saw 4-5 tumbles and then it was gone. served in the navy during korean conflict as a member of catapult crew 1950 -54. had much night operations.this is a unique sighting.
